Class SimpleJob

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.serfshack.jobwrangler.core.Dependable

        • com.serfshack.jobwrangler.core.SimpleJob

  • public abstract class SimpleJob
extends Job<java.lang.Boolean>
    A basic Job implementation to use if you don't care about the result.

      • configureRunPolicy

        protected RunPolicy configureRunPolicy()
        Description copied from class: Job
        Every job has one RunPolicy that governs its lifecycle. See RunPolicy
        Specified by:
        configureRunPolicy in class Job<java.lang.Boolean>
        Returns:
        A new RunPolicy to be applied to the job. Called once as part of initializing the job, or as part of inflating a persisted job as the RunPolicy itself is not persisted.
